title: Notion Dashboard Scene Schema
description: Schema for a scene displaying a Notion-like dashboard within a browser frame.

type.description: The type of the scene, used for component mapping.

mainHeading.description: The main heading text below the browser frame.

subHeading.description: The subheading text below the browser frame.

browserUrl.description: The URL displayed in the browser frame's address bar.

dashboardTitle.description: The title of the Notion-like dashboard.

sections.description: An array of sections within the dashboard.

title.description: The title of the dashboard section.

emoji.description: An emoji character for the section title.

items.description: An array of items within the section.

text.description: The text content of the dashboard item.

checked.description: Whether the item's checkbox is checked.
